name: postal
description: Postal is a self-hosted mail delivery platform designed for sending and managing large volumes of email. It supports SMTP, webhooks, message logging, and domain management with full control over infrastructure.

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Receive real-time notifications for delivery events, bounces, and opens via webhooks

features.title: Message Logging
features.description: Track all sent emails with detailed logs including delivery status and recipient activity

features.title: Domain Management
features.description: Configure and manage multiple sending domains with DKIM and SPF authentication

features.title: Queue Management
features.description: Monitor and control email queues with retry logic and delivery scheduling

features.title: REST API
features.description: Send emails programmatically using a RESTful API with comprehensive documentation

features.title: Ip Pool Management
features.description: Distribute sending across multiple IP addresses to optimize deliverability and reputation
